cast.overview: The former World Heavyweight Champion Rocky Balboa serves as a trainer and mentor to Adonis Johnson, the son of his late friend and former rival Apollo Creed.
cast.title: Creed

details.biography:
Hannah Storen Hicks, known professionally as Hannah Storm, is an American television sports journalist, serving as the anchor of ESPN's SportsCenter Face to Face. She was also host of the NBA Countdown pregame show on ABC as part of the network's NBA Sunday game coverage.

Description above from the Wikipedia article Hannah Storen Hicks, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
details.name: Hannah Storm
